title: Surviving Parenthood (TEFC)
brief_description: Two different groups of parents discuss their feelings and attitudes about coping with children in an honest and unaffected way. Highlights the difficulties couples have adjusting to parenthood and the success or otherwise of “bonding”.
description: Two different groups of parents discuss their feelings and attitudes about coping with children in an honest and unaffected way. Highlights the difficulties couples have adjusting to parenthood and the success or otherwise of “bonding”.
